mapper.select: SELECT f.*, u.user_nickname, u.user_vegan_type FROM feed f JOIN users u ON f.user_key = u.user_key ORDER BY feed_create_dt desc;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS feedCount FROM feed f LEFT JOIN users u ON f.user_key = u.user_key WHERE f.user_key = #{userKey}
SELECT * FROM feed WHERE feed_tag LIKE CONCAT('%', #{feedTag}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed ( user_key, feed_content, feed_create_dt, feed_update_dt, feed_tag ) VALUES ( #{userKey}, #{feedContent}, NOW(), NOW(), #{feedTag})
